text: Anthony Allen Williams (born July 28, 1951) is an American politician who was the fourth person to serve as Mayor of the District of Columbia, for two terms, from 1999 to 2007. ==References== Category:1951 births Category:Living people Category:Mayors of Washington, D.C. Category:Politicians from Los Angeles Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians Category:African-American politicians
title: Anthony A. Williams
